title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: People say u cant create new currencyRegulations and rules....But in revolutionary time like this when something is over regulated it killing the competation when there is only monopoly and cartels it killing also the innovation.First place someone who created fed system and central banks it all started from the innovation Nobody is official first so lets give everybody opportunity to create new payment system and money.And currently tron is good.enough

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 19, 2022, 01:44:13 PMAnd currently tron is good.enoughWhile somewhat doing better than probably 80%+ of cryprocurrencies, you think this is good enough? You need to heighten your standards.And let's not forget that this is a coin that's pretty much controlled by Justin Sun.
